${modID}:ExampleCard.NAME: Name
${modID}:ExampleCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: This will automatically be used if the card is upgraded. Remove it if unneeded.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:StrikeRos.NAME: 打击
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 她的兄弟手握重剑
挥锤大地

${modID}:DefendRos.NAME: 防御
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 剑盾立体防御

${modID}:Skill3.NAME: 如你所愿
${modID}:Skill3.DESCRIPTION: 全力以赴。所有攻击牌费用*2，视为打出3次。每次打出有20%的概率眩晕目标。失去3点敏捷。
${modID}:Skill3.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 固有。全力以赴。所有攻击牌费用*2，视为打出3次。每次打出有20%的概率眩晕目标。失去3点敏捷。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: 这片大地仍垂怜你

${modID}:Memory.NAME: 回忆
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:ConcentrateRos.NAME: 集中
${modID}:ConcentrateRos.DESCRIPTION: 随机消耗一张牌，获得3点临时生命。
${modID}:ConcentrateRos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗一张牌，获得5点临时生命。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:FlyRos.NAME: 飞行
${modID}:FlyRos.DESCRIPTION: 消耗。获得1回合无实体。获得2敏捷。
${modID}:FlyRos.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 获得1回合无实体。获得2敏捷。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.

${modID}:HeavyAttackRos.NAME: 重击
${modID}:HeavyAttackRos.DESCRIPTION: 造成 *2 次 !D! 单体伤害和 *3 点全体伤害。
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.
Blizzard is a good example for this.

${modID}:PsyStorm.NAME: 念力风暴
${modID}:PsyStorm.DESCRIPTION: 消耗。对全体敌人造成2-4-8-16-32...点伤害。数量取决于X
${modID}:PsyStorm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 消耗，保留。对全体敌人造成2-4-8-16-32...点伤害。数量取决于X
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: You can put more text in here.
If you need to use it for stuff.

${modID}:ShieldStrike.NAME: ShieldStrike

${modID}:ShieldStrike.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 造成你当前护盾量的伤害（受伤害判定影响），目前为 !D!

${modID}:LoseControl.NAME: LoseControl
${modID}:LoseControl.DESCRIPTION: 失去2生命，造成 !D! 点伤害（受益3倍力量加成）。如果计算力量时伤害大于18点，获得1力量
${modID}:LoseControl.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: 失去2生命，造成 !D! 点伤害（受益3倍力量加成）。如果计算力量时伤害大于16点，获得1力量
